name: User Enrichment

description: Enrich Internal users for case context

parameters.name: NestedWorkflowOutput

steps.name: ActiveDirectory_Enrich entities
steps.description: Enrich Hostname or Username entities with Active Directory properties

parameters.name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
parameters.value: {"Mark entities as internal":false,"Specific Attribute Names To Enrich With":"","Should Case Wall Table be filtered by the specified Attributes?":false,"Should JSON result be filtered by the specified Attributes?":false}
